Become an icon with these fantastic poses. This pack includes Splits Kick, 360 High Kicks and the Flying Tornado Kick. \n\n
※ This is a portable item. [#Legal]

※Il s’agit d’objets portables. [#Legal]

Diventa un'icona con queste fantastiche pose. Questa serie include Calcio divaricato, Calci alti 360° e Calcio volante tornado. \n\n
